title: Austrian team hit by bus while riding in Leuven
content:
One junior woman was taken to the hospital with suspected injuries.

Four days after Chris Anker SÃ¸rensen was hit and killed by a driver while he was riding near Zeebrugge in Belgium the Austrian national team was hit by a local transit bus during their road race recon in Leuven.

Little information is available about how many riders were involved in the incident or what happened, but Leila Gschwentner, a 17-year old female, was taken to the hospital for a shoulder injury.

This story is ongoing.
